issue.title: [C++][Python] Un-deprecate FileSystem::OpenAppendStream
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14969](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14969). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-14904 surfaced a use case for appending to an existing file, so we should un-deprecate `FileSystem::OpenAppendStream` in C++ and Python.

That method will still remain unimplemented for filesystems which can't reasonably support it, such as S3, though.
